text: Fe'lu xui sumo (ej munofiqon dar tamasxur va kufr) ʙa monandi kasonest, ki pes az sumo nerumandtar va doroi amvol va farzandoni ʙestare ʙudand, pas onho az nasiʙi xes ʙahramand sudaed, hamcunon kasone, ki pes az sumo ʙudaand, az nasiʙi xes ʙahramand suda ʙudand. Sumo suxanoni ʙotil gufted, hamcunon, ki onho suxani ʙotil meguftand. A'moli onon dar dunjovu oxirat nociz gardid va zijonmand sudand
